name: Captain America
text: "I Can Do This All Day!" — Action: Discard 1 card from your hand → ready Captain America. (Limit once per round.)
real_text: "I Can Do This All Day!" — Action: Discard 1 card from your hand → ready Captain America. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "My duty to my country comes first, no matter the cost!"

linked_card.name: Steve Rogers
linked_card.text:
Living Legend — Reduce the cost of the first ally played each round by 1.

Setup: Search your deck and discard pile for the Captain America's Shield upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
linked_card.real_text: Living Legend — Reduce the cost of the first ally played each round by 1. Setup: Search your deck and discard pile for the Captain America's Shield upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Agent 13
text: Response: After Agent 13 enters play, remove 2 threat from a scheme.
real_text: Response: After Agent 13 enters play, remove 2 threat from a scheme.
flavor: "Cap, you said we'd fight as a team! I want to come with you!"

name: Fearless Determination
text: Hero Action: Captain America gets +1 THW until the end of the phase. Draw 1 card.
real_text: Hero Action: Captain America gets +1 THW until the end of the phase. Draw 1 card.
flavor: "No one dies on my watch." —Captain America

name: Heroic Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 6 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, stun that enemy.
real_text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 6 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, stun that enemy.

name: Shield Block
text: Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, exhaust Captain America's Shield → prevent all of that damage.
real_text: Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, exhaust Captain America's Shield → prevent all of that damage.

name: Shield Toss
text: Hero Action (attack): Discard X cards from your hand, then return Captain America's Shield from play to your hand → deal 4 damage to X enemies.
real_text: Hero Action (attack): Discard X cards from your hand, then return Captain America's Shield from play to your hand → deal 4 damage to X enemies.

name: Steve's Apartment
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Steve's Apartment → draw 1 card and heal 1 damage from Steve Rogers.
real_text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Steve's Apartment → draw 1 card and heal 1 damage from Steve Rogers.
flavor: Even Captain America needs a place to get away and rest.

name: Captain America's Helmet
text: Interrupt: When Captain America would be defeated, set his hit point dial to 1 instead. Then, discard this card.
real_text: Interrupt: When Captain America would be defeated, set his hit point dial to 1 instead. Then, discard this card.
flavor: "A soldier, even a super-soldier, is only as strong as his ideals." —Steve Rogers

name: Captain America's Shield
text: Restricted. (Max 2 restricted cards per player.) Captain America gets +1 DEF and gains retaliate 1.
real_text: Restricted. (Max 2 restricted cards per player.) Captain America gets +1 DEF and gains retaliate 1.
flavor: "This shield is a symbol of freedom." —Captain America

name: Super-Soldier Serum
text: Resource: Exhaust Super-Soldier Serum → generate a [physical] resource.
real_text: Resource: Exhaust Super-Soldier Serum → generate a [physical] resource.
flavor: "The serum gave Cap his super-strength. But his heart, his unrelenting determination — those were Steve's long before he picked up the shield." —Sharon Carter

name: Falcon
text: Response: After Falcon enters play, look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each treachery looked at this way, remove 1 threat from a scheme.
real_text: Response: After Falcon enters play, look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each treachery looked at this way, remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Hawkeye
text: Hawkeye enters play with 4 arrow counters on him. Response: After a minion enters play, remove 1 arrow counter from Hawkeye → deal 2 damage to that minion.
real_text: Hawkeye enters play with 4 arrow counters on him. Response: After a minion enters play, remove 1 arrow counter from Hawkeye → deal 2 damage to that minion.

name: Squirrel Girl
text: Response: After Squirrel Girl enters play, deal 1 damage to each enemy.
real_text: Response: After Squirrel Girl enters play, deal 1 damage to each enemy.

name: Wonder Man
text: [star] As an additional cost for Wonder Man to attack, you must discard 1 card from your hand.
real_text: [star] As an additional cost for Wonder Man to attack, you must discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Avengers Assemble!
text: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Ready each [[Avenger]] character you control. Until the end of the phase, each [[Avenger]] character in play gets +1 THW and +1 ATK.
real_text: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Ready each [[Avenger]] character you control. Until the end of the phase, each [[Avenger]] character in play gets +1 THW and +1 ATK.

name: Make the Call
text: Action: Pay the printed cost of an ally in any player's discard pile → put that ally into play under your control.
real_text: Action: Pay the printed cost of an ally in any player's discard pile → put that ally into play under your control.
flavor: "This is a code red! All hands on deck!" —Maria Hill

name: Strength In Numbers
text: Action: Exhaust any number of allies you control → draw 1 card for each ally exhausted this way.
real_text: Action: Exhaust any number of allies you control → draw 1 card for each ally exhausted this way.

name: The Power of Leadership
text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Leadership (blue) card.
real_text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Leadership (blue) card.

name: Quinjet
text: Response: After your turn begins, place 1 time counter on Quinjet. Action: Put an [[Avenger]] ally from your hand into play with printed cost equal to or less than the number of time counters on Quinjet. Then, discard Quinjet.
real_text: Response: After your turn begins, place 1 time counter on Quinjet. Action: Put an [[Avenger]] ally from your hand into play with printed cost equal to or less than the number of time counters on Quinjet. Then, discard Quinjet.

name: Mockingbird
text: Response: After Mockingbird enters play, stun an enemy.
real_text: Response: After Mockingbird enters play, stun an enemy.

name: Energy
text: Max 1 per deck.
real_text: Max 1 per deck.

name: Genius
text: Max 1 per deck.
real_text: Max 1 per deck.

name: Strength
text: Max 1 per deck.
real_text: Max 1 per deck.

name: Avengers Tower
text: If each of your allies has the [[Avenger]] trait, increase your ally limit by 1. Action: Exhaust Avengers Tower → reduce the cost of the next [[Avenger]] ally played this phase by 1.
real_text: If each of your allies has the [[Avenger]] trait, increase your ally limit by 1. Action: Exhaust Avengers Tower → reduce the cost of the next [[Avenger]] ally played this phase by 1.

name: Honorary Avenger
text:
Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait.
Max 1 per character.
Attach to a friendly character.
Attached character gets +1 hit point and gains the [[Avenger]] trait.
real_text:
Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait.
Max 1 per character.
Attach to a friendly character.
Attached character gets +1 hit point and gains the [[Avenger]] trait.

name: Man Out of Time
text: Give to the Steve Rogers player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Steve Rogers → remove Man Out of Time from the game. • Discard half of the cards in your hand, rounded down. Discard this obligation.
real_text: Give to the Steve Rogers player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Steve Rogers → remove Man Out of Time from the game. • Discard half of the cards in your hand, rounded down. Discard this obligation.

name: Hit Squad
text: When Revealed: In player order, each player discards the top card of the encounter deck and takes 1 damage for each boost icon discarded this way.
real_text: When Revealed: In player order, each player discards the top card of the encounter deck and takes 1 damage for each boost icon discarded this way.
flavor: Baron Zemo leads a Hydra taskforce into the city to hunt down Avengers.

name: Baron Zemo
text: Quickstrike. While Baron Zemo is engaged with you, you cannot thwart. (Captain America's nemesis minion.)
real_text: Quickstrike. While Baron Zemo is engaged with you, you cannot thwart. (Captain America's nemesis minion.)
flavor: "To avenge my father, Captain America must die."

name: Hydra Soldier
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) When Defeated: Deal the engaged player an encounter card.
real_text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) When Defeated: Deal the engaged player an encounter card.

name: Hail Hydra!
text: When Revealed: Each [[Hydra]] minion engaged with a hero attacks that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Hydra]] minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck if it was searched.
real_text: When Revealed: Each [[Hydra]] minion engaged with a hero attacks that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Hydra]] minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck if it was searched.

name: Enraged
text:
Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally.
Attached ally gets +2 ATK and takes +1 consequential damage after it attacks.
real_text:
Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally.
Attached ally gets +2 ATK and takes +1 consequential damage after it attacks.

name: Followed
text: Attach to a side scheme. Max 1 per scheme. Interrupt: When attached scheme is defeated, deal 4 damage to an enemy.
real_text: Attach to a side scheme. Max 1 per scheme. Interrupt: When attached scheme is defeated, deal 4 damage to an enemy.

name: Expert Defense
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When your hero defends against an attack, it gets +3 DEF for that attack.
real_text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When your hero defends against an attack, it gets +3 DEF for that attack.
flavor: "Do these guys ever run out of ammo!" —Captain America

name: Enhanced Awareness
text: Uses (3 mental counters). Hero Resource: Exhaust Enhanced Awareness and remove 1 mental counter from it → generate a [mental] resource.
real_text: Uses (3 mental counters). Hero Resource: Exhaust Enhanced Awareness and remove 1 mental counter from it → generate a [mental] resource.
